bridge.toolkit.util
Class XMLParser

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.util.XMLParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
DMParser
public class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a way to find the any values in an XML document using JDOM.

Field Summary
(package private)  org.jdom.input.SAXBuilder parser
          Builds a JDOM document from the XML file.
(package private)  org.jdom.output.XMLOutputter printer
          Outputs a JDOM document as a stream of bytes.
private  java.util.List<java.lang.String> value
          List of all the values found for the attribute being searched in the XML document.

getAttribute

public void getAttribute(java.io.File anXmlDocFile,
                         java.lang.String element,
                         java.lang.String attribute)
Parses through the entire XML document and gets the value of the desired attribute of the given element.

Parameters:
anXmlDocFile - File that is the XML file to be parsed.
element - String that represents the given element.
attribute - String that represents the desired attribute of the given element.

searchForAttribute

private void searchForAttribute(java.util.List<org.jdom.Element> elements,
                                java.lang.String element,
                                java.lang.String attribute)
Loops through all the elements in the XML file and finds the desired element and value of the searched Attribute.

Parameters:
elements - List of elements for the current node in the DOM tree.
element - String that represents the given element.
attribute - String that represents the desired attribute of the given element.
